overview: This adventure is set in the Philippines and chronicles the exploits of two men who survive a plane crash in the jungle. One of the men is an avaricious killer who has come to the islands to search for a fortune in diamonds. The other is an international adventurer. Now they must somehow overcome their vast personal differences and desires to survive in the steamy wilderness
tagline: From Hong Kong to Malaya...From Singapore to the Phillipines...The Chase Was On! The Stakes - A Fortune in Diamonds!
title: Flight to Fury
